action.primary: Invigorates the Blood and unblocks the channels and collaterals

indications: Heart Blood Stasis with chest pain and stroke with hemiplegia

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity and stops coughing

indications: Topically, as a powder for burns

contraindications: This herb is not recommended for Deficiency patients.
Contraindicated for those who tend to bleed.
interactions: Use with caution for patients taking anticoagulants such as heparin, warfarin (Coumadin) and enoxaparin (Lovenox) or antiplatelet drugs such as aspirin, dipyridamole (Persantine) and clopidogrel (Plavix) as concurrent use may have an additive or synergistic effect.

useCases: Chest pain and hemiplegia due to Blood Stasis
